title: Hanes Men's Short-Sleeve Jersey Pocket Polo (Pack of 2)
description: 2-PACK CONVENIENCE - This value pack comes with 2 Hanes men's polo shirts for stock-up ease.
RECYCLED FIBERS - Hanes EcoSmart polo shirt is made with up to 5% recycled polyester fibers for a feel-good finish.
ALL ABOUT THE DETAILS - Rib-knit cuffs and a welt collar keep their shape.
BUTTON-UP - Men's shirts feature a clean-finished placket with two pearlized buttons for added styling
PATCH POCKET - Accented with a front patch pocket at the chest.
QUALITY FABRIC - Soft 50/50 cotton polyester-blend jersey fabric resists wrinkles.

Classic comfort in a wardrobe essential you can feel good about – what’s not to like about that? Hanes® EcoSmart® men’s polo shirts are crafted from a 50/50 cotton-polyester blend that includes a portion of recycled polyester fibers. Featuring timeless polo styling, this collared men’s short sleeve shirt boasts a front patch pocket, rib-knit cuffs, and a welt collar that keeps its shape. A clean-finished placket includes two pearlized buttons. The ultra-soft cotton-blend jersey fabric resists wrinkles and is machine washable. Available in a convenient 2-pack, this men’s jersey shirt is as comfortable as a favorite tee and pairs just as well with jeans, shorts, and khakis.
